data.name: Dusky Gray Facebook [Dark Theme]
data.description:
When the night has come, and the land is dark, and the moon is the only light... Keep your eyes healthy with the best facebook dark theme ever!
Full Theme (personal profile, business page, chat, messenger, marketplace, events, calendar, video player, stories...) messenger.com and facebook.onion supported! Social plugins/widgets excluded! Feel free to tell me if you see any problems, I'll try to fix them quickly! For colored icons, use the "Customize Settings" button, thanks. Please turn the new Facebook dark mode on, thanks NEW! I've just created a stand alone ADDON for this theme for Firefox and Opera for now (Firefox - Opera) More infos just here with Chrome users instructions... Thanks

data.name: Cool Roblox Style fixed
2018.04 - JIRA improvements
data.description: A few tweaks to make JIRA a bit more powerful. Fade out completed tasks, color columns by type, etc. Customized for the VT JIRA install

data.name: OpenTimeClock Free Dark Theme
data.description: OpenTimeClock Free Dark Theme - By Bowser

data.name: Christian Chat - Dark Theme
data.description: This is a Dark theme for Christian chat that makes browsing the forums much easier on the eyes.

data.name: TypeTest.io - customizable
data.description: Reduces the main colors to two, one background color and one color for text, with the exception of the correction colors (standard: red/green), lets you change font style and font-size

data.name: Dark Folding@Home Client
data.description: Change your Folding@Home theme for a darker and cleaner one.
